short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance the code review experience on GitHub, Gitlab, and Bitbucket

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

Extend and streamline your code review experience with SourceField!
SourceField gives dev teams the superpower to know when they are about to ship a bug - not how many lines of code have changed. SourceField's code intelligence platform analyzes your code change, who & what is affected, and then highlights that on every Pull Request.
 
==============================
FEATURES

☆ AI-powered pull request details can be generated with the click of a button [GitHub, BitBucket, GitLab]
☆ AI-powered code suggestions in review comments [GitHub, BitBucket (Alpha stage), GitLab]
☆ Display Risk Score metrics on the Files Changed view [GitHub]
☆ Record and attach audio and screen recordings, including a transcription, to pull request comments with Code Aware Transcriptions (CATs) [GitHub, BitBucket, GitLab]
☆ View and play back audio and screen recordings directly from the pull request interface [GitHub, BitBucket, GitLab]
☆ Arcs make it easy to highlight and strategically organize individual files and comments in a Pull Request [GitHub]
